Description of incident: "The New York State Office of Mental Health (OMH) recently announced that one of its facilities experienced a cybersecurity breach, which potentially exposed the records of research participants. Between April 28 and May 4 of this year, certain parts of New York State Psychiatric Institute’s system was accessed by unauthorized individuals, according to an online statement.The information may have included names, addresses, dates of birth, telephone numbers, and email addresses. Social Security numbers, driver’s license or state identification numbers, school, county, and coded health-related information from interviews or questionnaires may have been included in some cases."
